mapper.select: SELECT r.reservation_idx, r.room_idx, r.user_idx, r.title, r.attendees, r.date, r.start_time, r.end_time, r.content, r.is_recurring, r.recurring_idx, ro.name AS room_name, u.name AS user_name FROM reservations r LEFT JOIN rooms ro ON r.room_idx = ro.room_idx LEFT JOIN users u ON r.user_idx = u.user_idx WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY r.date DESC, r.start_time DESC
